summary:
Custom house without Load Doors containing as usual everything u 
need (Smithing, Enchanting, Alchemy, Displays...). Location: Nearby 
the Guardian Stones. See SCREENSHOTS for the KEY LOCATION or just pick the Lock.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#01DFD7]Guardian House maybe...[/color][/center]

[center]Custom house without Load Doors containing as usual everything u 
need (Smithing, Enchanting, Alchemy, Displays...). Location: Nearby 
the Guardian Stones thus the name \"Guardian House\". [/center]

[center][color=#A5DF00]See SCREENSHOTS for the KEY LOCATION or just pick the  Lock.[/color][/center]

Take a look at the screenshots for More Info about the house.

[color=#FA58AC]CHANGE LOG[/color]

28 April 2012 => Update [color=#FF0000]0.9.2[/color]

-Changed Cliffs into Nordic Ruins; Fixed floating chair and table 
-Draugr guarding the key :D few more changes...

-[color=#848484]No more Updates except for requests.[/color]

[color=#00FFFF]INSTALLATION:[/color]

[color=#9FF781]NEW USERS SKIP TO 5. [/color]

[color=#FA8258]INSTALLATION FOR THE USERS OF THE OLD VERSION:[/color] 
[color=#D7DF01](Only for the best results; if not you too skip to 5. and just overwrite the old files)[/color]

  1. Remove all your items from the house
  2. Exit the game and delete The old Version (just .Esp)
  3. Start your Game- make sure u don\'t get a CTD ...
  4. Make A new save and quit the game

[color=#9FF781] 5. Place AstRoom.esp and Scripts into your Skyrim data folder[/color]


[color=#FA58AC]UNINSTALLATION:[/color]
-Run Skyrim Launcher go to Data; Select AstRoom and click Delete + all associated files
-or go into your Skyrim Data Folder and delete AstRoom.esp and LightScript.pex form Script Folder
-else NMM


[color=#A5DF00]BUGS:[/color] 
-None so far except Mannequin wandering the house :s Sometimes...
Feel Free to report in the comments about Bugs if Any; and ill try to 
respond, fix... as soon as i can.

[color=#F78181]CREDITS:[/color]
Special Thanks to : [color=#74DF00]Benemorte,Rinobi,JayPea21[/color] and everyone for using, testing and reporting about errors, bugs,etc... about this plugin.
Thanks to ZeniMax Media for Creating Skyrim; Nexus for allowing us to make the game more beautiful and share it with the world... although there are times when all this makes me throw my PC down the window :P
author: Trance
